documents.document: I think it's almost a right of passage for SFU students to have to walk down the mtn because the bus can't make it up.
I mean at least he was honest???
My bus driver just gave us a warning that we might not make it up the mountain because of the snow 🙃
#bellletstalk because self care is not selfish, and it's time to prioritize mental health.
@JaooDan @YouTube my cat would rip my face off if I tried to lick her with that LOL
Do you ever sneeze so hard that you wonder how your insides are still inside?
Those days when you're so productive you gotta take a moment and applaud yourself 🙌❤
@rchlcwng when his press secretary said that, I actually died a bit
I just overheard a student say it's too early in the semester to wear sweatpants to school. Uhmm, it's NEVER too early???
@rchlcwng I'm the one in the green
@rchlcwng LOL when it's normally this https://t.co/UG4LD3X0nL
I'm having one of those days where even I annoy myself.
Idk why, but no matter how much I have on my plate, I always feel like I'm not doing enough.
The same prof with the sippy cup says "bless you" to anyone that sneezes in class <3
@TrishaDulku @rchlcwng oooo, I'm gonna take a look! Thank you! :)
@rchlcwng we're obsessed LOL
You know when something exciting happens and it takes you forever and a day to stop thinking about it? Yeah.
My heart is a puddle after seeing the "I miss you" message @TrishaDulku sent me of the student I used to volunteer with 😭
My prof broke out this bad boy today in class. My heart 😌 https://t.co/M2dCC1bumc
@furtadomatthew GREY LIMOUSINE?
@rchlcwng OH RIGHT. Let's go apartment shopping then lol
@rchlcwng IM READY. WHEN ARE WE GOING
Walking out of the theatre after watching Moana https://t.co/ajOWTuFxmO
I will pay someone to bring me hot chocolate. Or for someone to bring me TO hot chocolate. Either way.
@furtadomatthew you don't have arthritis
Today, I bought my 15 year old cat a step ladder to my bed because of her joint pain. I'm such a good cat mom 😺
Being able to breathe out of one nostil when you're sick is honestly such a blessing.
@DOOROTHY IT'S HAPPENING, HMU WHEN YOU'RE BACK. I HAVE THE PERFECT SONG IN MIND.
@rchlcwng WHO IS THIS. I'LL FIGHT THEM. WHY ARE PEOPLE LIKE THIS
@DOOROTHY COME HOME AND LET'S DO IT
@furtadomatthew from what lol
Someone do a Christmas cover with me plz. 🎄
@dnnocampo those are the best movies though
@rchlcwng and I are super salty about @SFU cancelling our exam last minute, but unfortunately it wasn't enough to melt the snow.
My anxiety is flaring up again and I'm not for it rn.
@rchlcwng if our exam gets pushed, I'm gonna kill something
Totally got a taste of dirty snow this morning plummeting to the ground while getting off the bus. What if I actually ate sh*t.
just out here living my best life https://t.co/hi2UoiRdx4
I find it so sad that I saw the snow this morning through Snapchat before I did in person looking through a window.
One of the best feelings in the world is not wanting to go to work and waking up to a text saying it's a snow day 😅🙌
@rchlcwng I HAVE. MY HEART CAN'T TAKE IT
@rchlcwng like how dare he LOL And TY friend 😄❤
A 1st year tried to ask me out today but when he found out I'm a 4th year he was just like "nvm bye". Wow, thx.
What am I supposed to do when @GeorgeNozuka follows me? Brb, screaming https://t.co/lNFsRozsMr
@furtadomatthew omg it's the face of SFU
@TrishaDulku my connection with it is too strong
@celinaagood he won't take no for an answer
@dnnocampo didn't even get a deal on this starter pack because university is so damn expensive
If this day wasn't bad enough, I forgot I drove to school and took the 145 down the mountain 🙃
When you spend so much time on the 145 that you become the 145. https://t.co/r1u2ATOhFH
I sometimes feel like I'm neglecting my cat when I watch cat videos next to her.
BRUNO MARS. 2017. IT'S HAPPENING. OMG IM CRYING 😭😭😭
There is no safer time to ride in the car with me than when I have pho take out riding shot gun. #gentleturns
I did the splits for the first time in years and now my legs are ready to fall off @kissthetiger @JaooDan
Tfw you realize you've been working on the wrong layer on illustrator for the past hour. https://t.co/Od6n1pJMfB
Saw this outside the school I volunteer at, and it's safe to say we were all concerned. Like, only a $6.00 reward?! https://t.co/GozQqgmVlz
Tbh my trip to Vegas was mostly just me trying out all of Guy Fieri's restaurants. https://t.co/fRj4IMZJfv
@shaneksharma I'm literally the worst
I woke up hating myself because I forgot to stock up on hot Cheetos while in the US.
The best thing to hear at any customs is "No, it's okay, you're Canadian" LOL
can we share the PM
American friend on the election: It's like a group project, I did my part but everyone else messed up. #election2016
What my meditation app told me today https://t.co/IHzJZz659Q
A guy in tutorial thinks the underrepresentation of Asians in media is a minor problem. 😦 https://t.co/qHyjFPz0Rr
I spent the past 20 mins googling how jellyfish move. Help me.
Spent the past 10 mins trying not to look out the staff room window cuz ppl be swapping spit right outside. plz stop #hbdtome
@ricepaperbird it is honestly the most infuriating thing 😣
Actually so mad at the kid that snatched like 10 chocolates from the pack of 30 I bought. Wtf calm plz.
Halloween's not even over and I'm already planning to put my Christmas tree up this week.
A dude just yelled "KONNICHIWA" to me on the street. Like what if I went up to all white people and said "CHIP CHIP CHEERIO" #stopassuming 😒
It took me 10 mins to open a child proof package. Child proof = Emma proof.
My solution for not watching the scary parts in horror movies is to just take off my glasses. Then I see nothing.
My cat sneezed in my face while I was yawning 😦
Today I got so heated in class discussion that I now have to watch cat videos to calm down.
I nearly got crushed to death last night at Chance, but 10/10 would risk it again. #MagnificentColoringWorldTour
Idk why me unknowingly handing in my assignment 12 hrs early makes me anxious. Maybe bc I think I could've done more 😔

Me explaining a game to the kids I volunteer with: "When you feel a squeeze, give a squeeze!"
lol

Attention bus passengers: MAN 👏 SPREADING 👏 IS 👏 NOT 👏 ACCEPTABLE👏
👏
@JustBeingKyle I literally just watched a video of a cat sleeping for like 5 mins

Me: okay time to log off fb and do h.w
Also me: hell yeah I need to watch a video on how to make a rainbow cheesecake
You don't know stress until you've lost your mother at an Asian supermarket on a Sunday.
I got placed next to two people having a first date and it's getting hella awkward

Me to my cat: high five Sam!
*Cat actually raises his paw to my hand*
Me: https://t.co/nEN4WgjTdy
From now on, the only way I'll look at Donald Trump is through Snapchat filters. His real face is too much.
I love watching my cat try to fix himself into a box that is clearly too small for him. Like that's right, you ain't that cool.
At times when transiting home, I feel so tired that I'm scared I might miss a step and book it down the stairs at surrey central
S/O to the 326 bus driver who stopped and allowed me on even when he was already pulling out of the bay ❤🚍
Every time Trump talks it sounds like he's just struggling to make word count.
'Chunky' by @BrunoMars is literally everything I want in a song.
Do you ever find that song that makes all the bad go away?
When it's week 7 of fourth year and you, @karinpok & @furtadomatthew still manage to walk into the wrong classroom. "This is math 190, bro"
@TrishaDulku heck yeah I am 😎
It's a weeknight and I'm showered and in bed before 10pm. Who am I
Just watched Rocky Horror Picture Show for the first time and my mind can't comprehend what just happened. #toast #wheresyourneck
One of the moms at my photo booth event this morning thought I was one of the parents and that the little Asian boy next to me was my son 😳
The lady sitting next to me on the skytrain literally smells like an ENTIRE can of Febreze.
For the days when you're literally running around like a chicken with no head, just remember to breathe, damnit
@TrishaDulku @rchlcwng @BuzzFeed omg I need this so I can match with my sushi shirt 🍣
